Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Reviewer "Checkitout"
Reviews.Content: Not bad for a fake. It fooled all of my friends so far.  My real cameras have a ring of glowing red LEDs instead of the one blinking on these cams but I never mentioned it and no one noticed as yet.  I have my doubts as far as the batteries staying dry. There is not much protection from the elements with just the sun hood. Probably will do alright well under an eave. Time will tell. With the Video Stickers in view the neighborhood kids do antics and 'monkeyshine' dances in front of the cam.

Reviews.Title: Easy to order, fast delivery and does the job
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Does the job, no hassles  with changing batteries........... Cheaper then a battery operated system. Keeps people away, good until I get the real deal.

Reviews.Title: Serves purpose well
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Although this dummy camera is made out of plastic, it looks very real. As long as it's mounted high enoughto be out of reach, it should be a good deterrent.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Rdys
Reviews.Content: Received quickly. Product as expected for this price. Looks good. Checked operation and the solar function was fine. Can also be used with batteries.

Reviews.Title: Not real happy with this item.
Reviews.Author: Jim Eagle
Reviews.Content: Looks real but though it is indoor outdoor my use would be outdoor. Outdoor use with the solar panel is not possible because it says to keep out of the weather. Where I want to put it is not possible for it to get sunlight and be out of the weather too.

Reviews.Title: Not for use OUTDOORS?
Reviews.Author: SGonzo
Reviews.Content: Though the cameras are realistic looking and seem to be well constructed the directions for installing say do NOT use outdoors unless you shelter the camera from the elements!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Made of high quality and durable material
Realistic appearance, looks like the real monitor and camera
Appears to work as an actual security camera.
With a red flashing LED light, can be seen at night.
Solar Powered
ProductInfo.Name: BestDealUSA Outdoor Fake Dummy Solar Powered Home Shop Security Camera Realistic Appearance
